source_text: automatically convert its 20% interest in the Assets into a 2% net smelter return royalty over all minerals produced from the Tenements (Royalty) (following which the legal and beneficial interests in the Assets will be deemed to be: TechGen 100%; Vendor 0%).
additional_details: The royalty is received by the Vendor (Norman McCleary and Hedron 101 Pty Ltd) and paid by TechGen Metals Limited.
